name.ja: <ruby>伍世壊浄心<rt>マナドゥム・リフレーミング</rt></ruby>

text.en: When a Spell/Trap Card, or monster effect, is activated whie you control a Synchro Monster: Negate the activation, then, if you have "Visas Starfrost" or a monster with 1500 ATK/2100 DEF on your field or in your GY, you can destroy that negated card. You can banish this card from your GY, then target up to 3 "Manadome" monsters in your GY; shuffle them into the Deck. You can only use each effect of "Manadome Reframing" once per turn.
